text: Break-Even > TI = TK Sikerhetsmarginal > SM = qv ” Ik Pris/st = 30 SEK /st FK = 2,400,00 SEK RK/st = 22 SEK /st qv = 540,000 st a) TI = TK < Pris/st X qx = FK + RK/st x q, & qr = FK/(Pris/st - RK/st) = 2,400,00/(30-22) = 300,000 st b) SM = qy - qi (volym) = 540,00 - 300,000 = 240,000 st <) SM (%) = (qv - a0/ Qi = 240,000/540,000 = 44.4%
